name: acceptably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a satisfactory way that can be agreed to or approved of: The local authority was pleased to report acceptably low levels of sewage in the water. If you can't behave acceptably, you will be punished.
just well enough, but not very well: The students had performed acceptably in the exam but their scores were not impressive. They don't need to be angels, just acceptably well-behaved.
More examplesFewer examplesShe has a very direct way of addressing people, but acceptably so.If necessary, reformat the letter so it fits acceptably on a single page.You have to hunt around to find acceptably priced deals.
